text: By Kenneth Richard on 29. May 2017                                                                                             Posted in Hockey Team, Paleo-climatology  | 190 Responses Kenneth Richard Scientists Increasingly Discarding ‘Hockey Stick’ Temperature Graphs 300 Non-Hockey Stick Graphs Abrantes et al., 2017 Werner et al., 2017 Deng et al., 2017 Chapanov et al., 2017 Williams et al., 2017 Stenni et al., 2017 Li et al., 2017 Demezhko et al., 2017 Luoto and Nevalainen, 2017 Li et al., 2017 Mayewski et al., 2017 Rydval et al., 2017 Reynolds et al., 2017 Rosenthal et al., 2017 intermediate waters [0-700 m] were 1.5-2°C warmer during the Holocene Thermal Maximum than in the last century. Intermediate water masses cooled by 0.9°C from the Medieval Climate Anomaly to the Little Ice Age These changes are significantly larger than the temperature anomalies documented in the instrumental record Li et al., 2017 Goursaud et al., 2017 Guillet et al., 2017 Wilson et al., 2017 Tegzes et al., 2017 Tejedor et al., 2017 Fernández-Fernández et al., 2017 Cai and Liu et al., 2017 1970– 2000 was colder than the last stage of the Little Ice Age (LIA) Köse et al., 2017 Flannery et al., 2017 the mean SST estimate from that interval during the LIA is not significantly different from the late 20th Century SST mean Steiger et al., 2017 Chang et al., 2017 Krossa et al., 2017 Albot, 2017 Zhang et al., 2017 Kotthoff et al., 2017 Li et al., 2017 Vachula et al., 2017 Fischel et al., 2017 Li et al., 2017 Anderson et al., 2017 Woodson et al., 2017 Koutsodendris et al., 2017 Browne et al., 2017 Perșoiu et al., 2017 Kawahata et al., 2017 SST [sea surface temperatures] dropped by 3.5 °C [15.1 to 11.6 °C] within two centuries. Several peaks fluctuate by 2°C over a few centuries Saini et al., 2017 Dechnik et al., 2017 Wu et al., 2017 Sun et al., 2017 Wu et al., 2017 Park, 2017 Markle et al., 2017 Dong et al., 2017 Nazarova et al., 2017 Samartin et al., 2017 Thienemann et al., 2017 Li et al., 2017 Krawczyk et al., 2017 Pendea et al., 2017 Stivrins et al., 2017 Bañuls-Cardona et al., 2017 Reid, 2017 Åkesson et al., 2017      Posted in Hockey Team, Paleo-climatology Posted in
title: 80 Graphs From 58 New (2017) Papers Invalidate Claims Of Unprecedented Global-Scale Modern Warming
